constituent: daytime, shaku-hachi, flag, stick, nightbreak, sun, day, one, floor
koohiiStory1: Roosters in Japan are very civilised, they play the shakuhachi at nightbreak to signify the beginning of daytime.
koohiiStory2: In a Zelda game, you can warp to the daytime if you play your shakuhachi to bring about nightbreak... or your ocarina if you don´t have a shakuhachi.
words:
昼間(ちゅうかん): daytime, during the day
昼飯(ちゅうはん): lunch, midday meal
お昼(おひる): lunch, noon
昼食(ちゅうしょく): lunch, midday meal
昼寝(ひるね): nap (at home), siesta
昼間(ひるま): daytime, during the daytime
昼休み(ひるやすみ): lunch break
昼(ひる): noon, daytime
昼御飯(ひるごはん): lunch, midday meal
